General.Name: Century Global Commodities Corp
General.Description: Century Global Commodities Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, is involved in the exploration and mining of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores and develops for iron ores, and precious and base metals. The company's flagship project is the Joyce Lake Property, a direct shipping iron ore project that comprises six mineral licenses, which include a total of 682 claims covering a total area of approximately 17,049 hectares located in Newfoundland and Labrador. It also distributes food products in China, Hong Kong, and Macau. The company is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Houston Centre, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
